data: Hao Dong is an assistant professor, with the university honor title Boya Young Fellow, at the Center for Social Research, Guanghua School of Management, Peking University. He is also a Non-resident Scholar at the Paul and Macia Wythes Center on Contemporary China, Princeton University, where he worked as a Postdoctoral Research Associate and Visiting Assistant Professor. PRCC 2019-14: Dong, Hao and Fan, Xiaoguang . 2019. " What Enables the "Meritocratic Power" of A College Degree? Evidence from Changing Higher Education and Employment Access in Post-Revolution China. "
